name: The Gloomwood
description: A vast enchanted forest where ancient trees whisper secrets in a forgotten language. It is home to myriad magical creatures and the elusive Faenan, the guardians of the forest.

name: Twilight Sanctuary
description: A sacred grove at the heart of the Gloomwood, pulsing with primal energies. It is a place of great spiritual importance, where the boundary between the physical and mystical realms is thin.

name: Celestial Mirror Cavern
description: A hidden cavern that holds the ancient artifact known as the Celestial Mirror. Those deemed worthy may glimpse visions of past and future upon its surface.

name: Starwatch Peak
description: A towering peak that serves as a natural observatory for studying the stars. Scholars and seers gather here to interpret the will of the gods through celestial patterns.

name: The Whispering Glade
description: A serene glade where the wind carries the voices of the Gloomwood. It is a place of contemplation and insight, often visited by those in search of clarity and wisdom.
